name: Astro
description: Astro Framework agnostic metaframework for building frontend applications

name: Blazor
description: Blazor Blazor is a modern front-end web framework based on HTML, CSS, and C# that helps you build web apps faster. With Blazor, build web apps using reusable components that can be run from both the client and the server so that you can deliver great web experiences.

name: DW Core
description: DW Core DW Core is a new frontend framework for DW 10 being developed by twoday DX in cooperation with DynamicWeb

name: Next
description: Next React based metaframework for building frontend applications

name: DW Swift 2
description: DW Swift 2 Swift 2 is Dynamic Webs Configurable frontend for DW based solutions

name: Shopify
description: Shopify Shopify is a full service commerce platform offering site setup, page editor, domain services commerce management, martech, tracking etc

name: Norce
description: Norce Norce Commerce is a composable, headless, SaaS platform for digital commerce, powered by human expertise. We empower companies with advanced needs to accelerate their digital commerce.

name: Azure Integration Services
description: Azure Integration Services Azure Integration Services (AIS) is a comprehensive platform provided by Microsoft Azure for performing mission-critical integrations and connecting applications, data, and services across cloud and on-premises environments16. This serverless compute experience drives efficiency and consistency in application connectivity, offering a flexible and scalable solution for various integration scenarios

name: Webflow
description: Webflow A visual page builder and CMS tool with native tools for personalization, A/B testing and localization.

name: Relewize
description: Relewize Relewise Search delivers a personalized product and content discovery that automatically ensures an uninterrupted user journey guiding customers directly to the products or information they are looking for and always understanding user's intent.

name: Umbraco Heartcore
description: Umbraco Heartcore Umbraco Heartcore is Umbracos SaaS based hedless CMS offering

name: Shopify Plus

name: Sanity CMS
description: Sanity CMS Sanityis a Norwegian headless CMS startup building a cloud first headless CMS based on frontend technologies

name: Netlify
description: Netlify Netlify is a hosting platform that instantly build and deploy your sites to their global network from Git. Custom domains, https, deploy previews, rollbacks and much more.

name: Cloudinary
description: Cloudinary Image & Video hosting service with built in optimization services. Added DAM-like capabilities with AI infused tools around media.

name: Vercel
description: Vercel Vercel provides the developer tools and cloud infrastructure to build, scale, and secure a faster, more personalized web.

name: Elastic Search
description: Elastic Search Elasticsearch is an open source distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine, scalable data store, and vector database capable of addressing a growing number of use cases. As the heart of the Elastic Stack, it centrally stores your data for lightning-fast search, fineâ€‘tuned relevancy, and powerful analytics that scale with ease.

name: Commerce Layer
description: Commerce Layer Commerce Layer is a headless commerce platform that makes it easy to bring any stock online. You don't even need a website. It only takes a few days to transform your business forever.

name: Umbraco Engage
description: Umbraco Engage Optimize user engagement and drive conversions with server-side analytics, A/B testing, profiling, and personalization. All you need to deliver optimized content and tailored digital experiences.

name: Portable Text
description: Portable Text Portable Text is an agnostic abstraction of rich text that can be serialized into pretty much any markup language, be it HTML, Markdown, SSML, XML, etc. It's designed to be efficient for real-time collaborative interfaces, and makes it possible to annotate rich text with additional data structures recursively.

name: Headless CMS
description: Headless CMS An enabling technology when building content supposed to be incorporated on sites with separate content sources, in environments where content is supposed to be published in multiple channels or for apps that only needs lists of short content snippets

name: API testing
description: API testing API testing automates testing Web API's, which in turn enables regression- and smoke-testing as well as monitoring API's with the right tooling setup.

name: Frontend E2E testing
description: Frontend E2E testing Frontend E2E testing aids in regression- and smoke-testing websites.

name: Frontend metaframeworks
description: Frontend metaframeworks Metaframeworks is used for building pure frontend applications and typically functions as build tools building Static Sites, Server Side Rendered sites, Single Page Applications and Multi Page applications.

name: Personalization
description: Personalization Content personalization according to various parameters known about the user.

name: Digital Asset Management
description: Digital Asset Management Systems and processes for managing, exposing and using digital assets like videos, images documents

name: Headless Commerce
description: Headless Commerce An enabling technology for implementing commerce functionality on websites based on CMS's without commerce functionality or on webshops based on headless setups

name: Bruno API Client
description: Bruno API Client Is a new'ish API client designed for teams collaborating on Web API's, it supports both REST and GraphQL based apis, and stores request collections as source code in your projects

name: Umbraco Commerce
description: Umbraco Commerce Umbraco Commerce is a plugin based commerce tool for Umbraco setups. Able to function as a headless commerce setup along the headless capabilities of Umbraco

name: Penpot
description: Penpot Penpot is the web-based open-source design tool that bridges \nthe gap between designers and developers. It can run through a SaaS offering from Penpot setup or self-hosted on your own server

name: Cypress
description: Cypress With Cypress, you can easily create tests for your modern web applications, debug them visually, and automatically run them in your continuous integration builds.
